General.Name: Guangdong Hongxing Industrial Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Guangdong Hongxing Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells knitted apparel in China. It offers household apparel, underwear, and other categories for women, men, and children under the Fenteng, Malenza, Fenteng Kean, and Qianxianyi brand names. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shantou, China.
